TextView.android:text: People who are passionate about pro-life do so from a place of love. We sincerely believe that these babies are not only alive but are pure and helpless. No one would be ok with millions of born babies getting terminated.

I believe the majority of people have not taken the time to think about when life becomes a life. It took me 25 years before I thought about it. Abortions have become normal. Many consider it a form of birth control. The casual why people view abortion is exactly why people aren’t taking the time to process the morality of it.

If I and others are correct then millions of babies have been murdered this generation, and more are being murdered every day. For those that believe we need to find a way to help. For those that haven’t made up there mind, its time to decide.
